Don't forget to download the latest version for the best experience!

New to the game? Don’t be shy, join the fun!

Whiteout Survival.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Tundra Album. Forge your legend in the icy realm! Gather Scene Fragments scattered across the tundra. And piece them together into spectacular scenes. Relive the timeless legends of the frost-bound era and make history yourself!
2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Kingshot.releaseNotes:
[New Content]
1. New Feature: Mystic Trial. A brand-new adventure awaits! 
2. New Feature: Leading Glory. During Kingdom Transfer, your Kingdom will receive a Leading Emblem each time it qualifies as a Leading Kingdom. Accumulate Leading Emblems to unlock special Leading Glory skins. Show off your Kingdom's dominance!
3. New Feature: Mood Status. Set a status to let others know how you're feeling, making social interactions more fun and personal.

Clash Royale.releaseNotes:
New Update: THE RISE OF HEROES!
• NEW HEROES: Knight, Giant, Musketeer, and Mini P.E.K.K.A gain powerful new abilities!
• NEW BOXES: Collect Hero Fragments and Evolution Shards in the new Hero and Evolution Boxes
• NEW CURRENCY: Introducing Crystals - earn and spend these beauties on exclusive cosmetics!
• TROPHY ROAD & RANKED REWORK: More Arenas, smoother progression, and easier access to Ranked
• PROGRESSION CHANGES: Now a simpler system with the removal of Elite Wild Cards, Books, and Magic Coins - and the addition of Level 16
• MERGE TACTICS: New Rulers, troops, and modifiers enter the Arena, while others take a career break
• Plus bug fixes and improvements

Township.releaseNotes:
"Get ready for a new update!
What's new in Township!

New Card Collection
* Sights, traditions, and curiosities from all over the world await you in the new Journey Collection! Collect all the cards to get a unique badge and other prizes!

Season Adventures
* We're celebrating Christmas, and then we're off to France! With the Christmas and French Passes, you can win resources to develop and decorate your town!

Thrilling New Adventures
* The Adventurers' Society is in danger! Can Richard, Rachel, and Zoe stop the villain?
* A walk in the mountains turns into a rescue mission for Richard and Rachel in the middle of a raging blizzard!

* Easy Navigation
Filling orders just got easier! Tap the magnifying glass to go to the factory you need, and you'll automatically return to your orders when you close the window.

Also
* A new match-3 element—Piñata!
* A challenge on the northern seas in the new regatta season!
* A new community building—Ice Arena!"

Pokémon GO.releaseNotes: Trainers, we hope you’re enjoying your adventure in Pokémon GO! We update the app regularly with new events and features, so make sure to check the in-game News to stay up to date.

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 11: 6th Anniversary is here! It’s our party—lock and load! Jump into DMZ: Recon, clash with the Street Fighter 6 content, and celebrate the fight that never ends. 

DMZ: Recon 
Enter DMZ: Recon, where every run is a test of instinct and endurance. Build your loadout, complete objectives, and battle hostiles and rival squads for valuable loot. Push deeper with every extraction to stack rewards, upgrade your gear, and dominate the battlefield. In DMZ: Recon, every player shapes their own path — adapt, outplay, and own every run. 

Street Fighter 6 x CODM 
New challengers have entered the fight in CODM! Suit up as Operators inspired by Chun-Li, Akuma, Ryu, and Cammy, each bringing signature finishers, emotes, and themed weapons to the fight. Complete the collection to wield the SMRS – Hadouken, Ryu’s legendary move reimagined for CODM. 

Play to unlock even more Street Fighter 6 content — Demir – Luke and unique rewards await in the Secret Cache. 

6th Anniversary 
Another year in the books, and CODM keeps evolving. Celebrate with us — vote for your favorite skins, take part in anniversary events, and discover Serpent Island in DMZ: Recon, where the party (and the cake) await. 

Double COD Points 
Earn 2X COD Points when you buy now! Stock up in-game while the deal lasts and claim your favorite Street Fighter 6 content. Don’t wait — this offer ends January 19 (UTC)! 

Secret Cache Legendary Refresh 
Alongside the Street Fighter 6 rewards arriving in the Secret Cache, a new Legendary is dropping! Unlock the Striker – Source Code and erase your enemies into the digital abyss. 

NEW BATTLE PASSES 
’Tis the season to suit up with your favorite holiday Operators! The Season 11 Battle Pass is packed with winter-wonderland rewards to get you in the spirit. Earn free gear like the new SO-14 Marksman Rifle, or go Premium to unlock Ajax – Muay Claus. Naughty or nice, every tier’s a gift worth unwrapping! 

NEW BATTLE PASS VAULTS 
Six years strong, and the journey continues! Over time, we’ve delivered some unforgettable Battle Passes, and in Season 11, we’re unlocking the Vault to bring back three fan-favorite classics: New Order (2021), HEIST (2022), and Siren Song (2023). Grab them before they’re gone—and stay tuned. The road to 7 years has even more favorites waiting to return. 

This season, we’re raising the bar — so celebrate with us as we take Call of Duty: Mobile to the next level and beyond. Here’s to six years of action… and the fight ahead!

Dark War:Survival.releaseNotes:
[Main Screen]
- Streamlined the World main interface to expand combat operation space: Removed the left sidebar. Troop information is now permanently displayed in the lower right corner.
- Two new settings added under [Avatar → Settings → General Settings]: [Drag troop avatars on the main screen to control troops] and [Return button visibility next to troops]. Used to enable/disable troop control via dragging avatars and toggling the visibility of the return button next to troops.
- Scout troops now display both march and return time.
- Increased spacing between the 4 march queues on the right side to reduce accidental taps.
- Added a [Rally] button to the left of the right-side march queues for quick access to the rally interface.
- The rally prompt bubble no longer pops up at the bottom left of the main screen when eligible for auto-join rallies.
- Removed the quick-jump bubble on Saturdays during the Alliance Duel [Enemy Buster].

[MutaBeast Hunt]
- After locating a MutaBeast, it will disappear if not defeated within 30 minutes. Survivors must search again (re-searching does not reset progress).
- After the event starts, the event bubble at the bottom of the main interface will display the current hunt progress.

[Chat]
- Using the [Reply] function will now automatically @ the other survivor.
- Tap the area above the reply box to see the original text, with translation available.
You can choose to add the survivor to your blacklist when reporting them.

[Combat Experience]
1. Experimental Feature
- A new [Experimental Feature] buff will be active on the days when [Alliance Duel] Enemy Buster, [State of Supremacy], and [Capital Clash] events begin.
- While the [Experimental Feature] buff is active, unit losses from attacking shelters will be reduced by 50%.
- The [Experimental Feature] is currently in beta testing. We welcome survivors to share your honest feedback with us through [Support].

2. World Battles
- Improved the selection logic for shelter buildings on the World Map, making it easier to select a shelter when dragging troops.
- Optimized the floating text display during combat, and hidden the floating text for buffs in battle.
- Improved the burning visual effects on shelters when wall durability decreases.

[Others]
- In [Black Gold Battlefield], battle results for Team B will be sent to all alliance members after the fight ends.
- [MutaBeast Hunt]
- When promoting units, the number of remaining units at that level will now be displayed below the unit icon.
- Optimized the visual presentation of the [Shadow Calls] event.
- Adjusted the display image on the Hero Exclusive Equipment Pack interface to show the corresponding exclusive equipment.
- Ruby-type items have been moved from the [Resources] tab to the [Special] tab in the inventory.
- Survivors earn rewards each time they unlock a new section of the Apocalypse Guide.

Marvel Contest of Champions.releaseNotes:
THE CONTEST TURNS 11! 
Join us this month as we celebrate our charming Champions and sensational Summoners!

NEW CHAMPION

Imperiosa
Not only the pinnacle of Eidol creation, but also the combined genius of every Founder who ever lived, Imperiosa is a vessel that contains the Founders' brilliance, cruelty, and will to dominate. Inhabiting a body composed of billions of tiny, synthetic ISO-based organisms, Imperiosa is able to rearrange these ""Synthects"" into a myriad of useful forms and functions depending on the situation. Additionally, Synthects can disassemble matter around them, providing raw materials to replicate themselves without limit. Though a hive mind, Imperiosa manifests as one voice speaking with absolute authority; an icon of the vile past, volatile present, and violent future of The Founders.


CHAMPION UPDATES


Punisher 
Punisher can handle some punishment before dishing it out. Indestructible and Physical Resistance are prominent once again.
Critical Hits and Bleeding out his Opponent make their return.
Villain's will fear his Impact, shredding their block with a Special 2 Attack.

Wolverine (X-23) 
Laura is back and she's ready to take down the competition with a Frenzy fueled rework.
Her aggressive playstyle focuses around striking her opponent to build up Frenzy, and eviscerating them with a flurry of attacks.
Laura's powerful Bleed Passives take things a step further when she taps into her instincts. Watch out!


NEW FEATURES


Alliance Coliseum
Is your Alliance ready for a new kind of challenge? Enter The Coliseum and see how many health bars you can deplete from your opponent, then compare scores with your Alliance mates to work out which attackers are best suited for the fight. Match your Champion with the correct daily bonus tags and level up your Podiums in order to score as high as possible and take your Alliance to the top!

NEW QUESTS AND EVENTS


Banquet Event - Asgardian Gala
No matter which of the nine-realms you call home, it is time for merry-making and feasting! So warriors such as Jane Foster and Valkyrie invite one and all to make the most out of this celebration as they prepare for battle against the invading Eidols. FEAST on resources, CELEBRATE with Summoners, and make merry... while you can.
Featuring our annual anniversary celebrations, Accolades Event, New Years ‘Ring it in’ Arenas and Glorious Guardians, this Banquet Event is not one to be missed! Get your first opportunity to acquire newly 7-Star Champions such as  Absorbing Man, Valkyrie, Scorpion, Kingpin, Punisher, and Super-Skrull during this Event!


Event Quest - Lost And Found
The final Eidol, IMPERIOSA has arrived and with them comes no shortage of destruction and danger. Power is draining from ISO-8, foes are assembling, but possible friends are also revealing themselves. Will all the Eidols fall in line once the secrets of the Founders are revealed? Or will Imperiosa’s downfall be a result of Eidol handywork?

Side Quest - Taken
Eidol invaders are taking over The Contest, and it has inspired The Collector into action. The Collector has a particular set of Skills (as well as Mutants, Sciences, and Techs). He had been attempting to take control over some Champions but 11 years of ISO-radiation and an ever-changing roster has perhaps left his skills of super-powered manipulation a little rusty. So now it’s up to The Summoner to break some violent brainwashing of a dozen Champions who have TAKEN a leave of their senses!

All this and more! Check out the complete list of exciting updates on playcontestofchampions.com

The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

Heads Up!.releaseNotes:
How do you throw an amazing winter party? Invite all the cool kids!

Updates

• This version includes content and cosmetic updates for our Winter event.
• 'Tis the season. Grab some hot cocoa and enjoy a round of laughter with "Act It Out", "Holiday Songs", "Holiday Movies", and more!
• Get a limited edition snowflake-themed card background with our holiday decks.

Please update your game for the latest content. Happy Playing!

Call of Duty®: Mobile.releaseNotes:
Call of Duty®: Mobile Season 11: 6th Anniversary is here! It’s our party—lock and load! Jump into DMZ: Recon, clash with the Street Fighter 6 content, and celebrate the fight that never ends. 

DMZ: Recon 
Enter DMZ: Recon, where every run is a test of instinct and endurance. Build your loadout, complete objectives, and battle hostiles and rival squads for valuable loot. Push deeper with every extraction to stack rewards, upgrade your gear, and dominate the battlefield. In DMZ: Recon, every player shapes their own path — adapt, outplay, and own every run. 

Street Fighter 6 x CODM 
New challengers have entered the fight in CODM! Suit up as Operators inspired by Chun-Li, Akuma, Ryu, and Cammy, each bringing signature finishers, emotes, and themed weapons to the fight. Complete the collection to wield the SMRS – Hadouken, Ryu’s legendary move reimagined for CODM. 

Play to unlock even more Street Fighter 6 content — Demir – Luke and unique rewards await in the Secret Cache. 

6th Anniversary 
Another year in the books, and CODM keeps evolving. Celebrate with us — vote for your favorite skins, take part in anniversary events, and discover Serpent Island in DMZ: Recon, where the party (and the cake) await. 

Double COD Points 
Earn 2X COD Points when you buy now! Stock up in-game while the deal lasts and claim your favorite Street Fighter 6 content. Don’t wait — this offer ends January 19 (UTC)! 

Secret Cache Legendary Refresh 
Alongside the Street Fighter 6 rewards arriving in the Secret Cache, a new Legendary is dropping! Unlock the Striker – Source Code and erase your enemies into the digital abyss. 

NEW BATTLE PASSES 
’Tis the season to suit up with your favorite holiday Operators! The Season 11 Battle Pass is packed with winter-wonderland rewards to get you in the spirit. Earn free gear like the new SO-14 Marksman Rifle, or go Premium to unlock Ajax – Muay Claus. Naughty or nice, every tier’s a gift worth unwrapping! 

NEW BATTLE PASS VAULTS 
Six years strong, and the journey continues! Over time, we’ve delivered some unforgettable Battle Passes, and in Season 11, we’re unlocking the Vault to bring back three fan-favorite classics: New Order (2021), HEIST (2022), and Siren Song (2023). Grab them before they’re gone—and stay tuned. The road to 7 years has even more favorites waiting to return. 

This season, we’re raising the bar — so celebrate with us as we take Call of Duty: Mobile to the next level and beyond. Here’s to six years of action… and the fight ahead!

緋聞港口：合併&故事.releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!

Dark War:Survival.releaseNotes:
[Main Screen]
- Streamlined the World main interface to expand combat operation space: Removed the left sidebar. Troop information is now permanently displayed in the lower right corner.
- Two new settings added under [Avatar → Settings → General Settings]: [Drag troop avatars on the main screen to control troops] and [Return button visibility next to troops]. Used to enable/disable troop control via dragging avatars and toggling the visibility of the return button next to troops.
- Scout troops now display both march and return time.
- Increased spacing between the 4 march queues on the right side to reduce accidental taps.
- Added a [Rally] button to the left of the right-side march queues for quick access to the rally interface.
- The rally prompt bubble no longer pops up at the bottom left of the main screen when eligible for auto-join rallies.
- Removed the quick-jump bubble on Saturdays during the Alliance Duel [Enemy Buster].

[MutaBeast Hunt]
- After locating a MutaBeast, it will disappear if not defeated within 30 minutes. Survivors must search again (re-searching does not reset progress).
- After the event starts, the event bubble at the bottom of the main interface will display the current hunt progress.

[Chat]
- Using the [Reply] function will now automatically @ the other survivor.
- Tap the area above the reply box to see the original text, with translation available.
You can choose to add the survivor to your blacklist when reporting them.

[Combat Experience]
1. Experimental Feature
- A new [Experimental Feature] buff will be active on the days when [Alliance Duel] Enemy Buster, [State of Supremacy], and [Capital Clash] events begin.
- While the [Experimental Feature] buff is active, unit losses from attacking shelters will be reduced by 50%.
- The [Experimental Feature] is currently in beta testing. We welcome survivors to share your honest feedback with us through [Support].

2. World Battles
- Improved the selection logic for shelter buildings on the World Map, making it easier to select a shelter when dragging troops.
- Optimized the floating text display during combat, and hidden the floating text for buffs in battle.
- Improved the burning visual effects on shelters when wall durability decreases.

[Others]
- In [Black Gold Battlefield], battle results for Team B will be sent to all alliance members after the fight ends.
- [MutaBeast Hunt]
- When promoting units, the number of remaining units at that level will now be displayed below the unit icon.
- Optimized the visual presentation of the [Shadow Calls] event.
- Adjusted the display image on the Hero Exclusive Equipment Pack interface to show the corresponding exclusive equipment.
- Ruby-type items have been moved from the [Resources] tab to the [Special] tab in the inventory.
- Survivors earn rewards each time they unlock a new section of the Apocalypse Guide.

2. New Feature: Leading Glory system. Each time your state qualifies as a Leading State during State Transfer, it will receive a Leading Emblem. The Leading Emblems can be used to unlock exclusive rewards such as Sunfire Castle Shield Skin, State Transfer Event State Name Card, Sunfire Castle Skin and Turret Skin, and Exclusive State Title. Stay proud of your state!
3. New Event: Dead Shot When participating in regular events, you have a chance of earning "Shotchits". You can use the "Shotchits" to play a shooting game. Hit the bullseye for bountiful rewards! Every 2 "Chest Keys" collected can be used to open a chest that contains extra bonuses. By spending enough Shotchits, you can unlock the exclusive Action Emote: Hit!

[Optimization & Adjustment]
1. Bear Hunt: Added the Auto-Register feature, which automatically starts a Bear Hunt based on the last opening time once the cooldown ends.
2. Castle Battle: Reduced the battle duration to 5 hours and the required occupation time for victory to 2.5 hours, without changing the battlefield opening hours.
3. Daybreak Island: Added a new basic decoration, "Marble Fence". Introduced the Like History feature, allowing you to view likes from other Chiefs.
4. Lighthouse Intel: Upon reaching Furnace Lv. 15 or VIP Lv. 5, you will unlock the "Claim All" feature for claiming your Intel rewards.
5. Alliance Championship: Added the "Batch-Adjust" feature to the troop info page, allowing R4 or higher officers to adjust lanes more efficiently.
6. Teleport: While using a "Territory Teleporter", you can freely adjust and select your target location before confirmation. If your target location is within your Alliance territory, "Territory Teleporters" will be used first.
7. Snowbusters:
a. Increased Fuel consumption and rewards for snow clearing (numerical adjustments only without changing the overall rewards). After a certain levels, monsters in an area can drop multiple Snowbuster Maps.
b. Added a feature that allows you to exchange Fuel for Rockets after clearing Area 16.
c. Added the Raid feature, which becomes available once you reach Area 24. You will be able to clear stages quickly by spending Fuel.
d. Snowbusters Pass Optimization: Using Rockets now grants Snow Points. 
8. Chief Gear: When your state age reaches a certain number of days, we will introduce T4 Legendary Gear (3-Star) and expand the sources for Chief Gear enhancement materials. The details are as follows:
a. Labyrinth Shop: "Chief Gear Materials Chest" will become available.
b. Alliance Championship Shop: The weekly purchase limit for "Polishing Solution", "Design Plan", and "Hardened Alloy" will be increased.
c. Crazy Joe: Personal Ranking Rewards and Alliance Ranking Rewards will be updated.
9. Frostdragon Tyrant: Introduced State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 10 Chiefs on the Occupation Ranking. Additionally, the Tyrant’s Gift will now appear at a random location near the Sunfire Castle instead of a fixed position.
10. Tundra Arms League: Introduced rank-determined State Rewards for all Chiefs at Furnace Lv. 20 or higher in the states of the top 4 Legions, which can be claimed manually.
11. Foundry Battle: After occupying a building for 30 minutes in Foundry Battle and Tundra Arms League, you will gain Personal Points much faster.
12. Mercenary Prestige: When your state unlocks Fire Crystal Lv. 8, a new type of Legend's Initiation will be introduced, and the current one will be renamed as Epic Initiation.
13. The Labyrinth: Introduced the Alliance Member Leaderboard, allowing you to view your allies' performances.

NEW POSTER: RUSH HOUR! Fresh off their latest act, Luna, Frank, and Viktor hit the streets at full speed. Sirens roar and the chase is on.

Stay sharp, Villains!
